content: 我来帮您找到与给定 embedding 最相似的三个 Surface 节点。首先需要了解图数据库的模式结构，然后查询相似的节点。

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "CALL db.schema.visualization() YIELD nodes, relationships RETURN nodes, relationships LIMIT 1"}

content: 现在我已经了解了图数据库的结构。我看到Surface节点有embedding索引，我可以使用给定的embedding来查找最相似的三个Surface节点。
我注意到查询结果没有返回id和attributes信息。让我查看一下Surface节点的实际属性结构，然后重新查询。
我需要先查看Surface节点的属性结构。
现在我可以查询与给定embedding最相似的三个Surface节点的具体属性。使用这些属性名来获取关键信息。

很好！现在我已经找到了三个最相似的Surface节点。根据您的需求，接下来我需要沿着关系的方向召回节点的邻接节点：Surface -> MachiningFeature -> ProcessUnit -> Operation -> Tool。

让我先从这些Surface节点开始，找到它们关联的MachiningFeature。

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (s:Surface)-[:BELONGS_TO_FEATURE]->(m:MachiningFeature) WHERE s.__id__ IN ['Surface_751331d0c4f80cf4', 'Surface_871bd7a04ff49237', 'Surface_45a4143f980258e9'] RETURN s.__id__ AS surface_id, s.face_type_name AS surface_type, m.__id__ AS machining_feature_id, m.__hash__ AS feature_hash, m.attributes AS feature_attributes LIMIT 10"}

content: 现在让我查看这些MachiningFeature的属性，然后找到它们关联的ProcessUnit。

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (m:MachiningFeature) WHERE m.__id__ IN ['MachiningFeature_455b09dc35c63457', 'MachiningFeature_e74f123109d8ae5c', 'MachiningFeature_85b284a341386483'] RETURN m.__id__ AS feature_id, keys(m) AS feature_keys LIMIT 3"}

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (m:MachiningFeature)-[:ASSIGNED_TO_PROCESS]->(p:ProcessUnit) WHERE m.__id__ IN ['MachiningFeature_455b09dc35c63457', 'MachiningFeature_e74f123109d8ae5c', 'MachiningFeature_85b284a341386483'] RETURN m.__id__ AS feature_id, p.__id__ AS process_unit_id, p.__hash__ AS process_hash, p.attributes AS process_attributes LIMIT 10"}

content: 现在查看ProcessUnit的属性，然后找到它们包含的Operation。

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (p:ProcessUnit) WHERE p.__id__ IN ['ProcessUnit_7c50e8c6db4bb048', 'ProcessUnit_4f6465ec458908d8', 'ProcessUnit_a975bc3992b1cce8'] RETURN p.__id__ AS process_id, keys(p) AS process_keys LIMIT 3"}

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (p:ProcessUnit)-[:INCLUDES_OPERATION]->(o:Operation) WHERE p.__id__ IN ['ProcessUnit_7c50e8c6db4bb048', 'ProcessUnit_4f6465ec458908d8', 'ProcessUnit_a975bc3992b1cce8'] RETURN p.__id__ AS process_id, p.typeName AS process_type, o.__id__ AS operation_id, o.__hash__ AS operation_hash, o.attributes AS operation_attributes LIMIT 10"}

content: 现在查看Operation的属性，然后找到它们使用的Tool。

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (o:Operation) WHERE o.__id__ IN ['Operation_27b223bd70a1254f', 'Operation_d726401014da9805', 'Operation_97e08ef99799d485', 'Operation_e901e20c2f6d2018', 'Operation_eb0dfb4600cb30d1', 'Operation_aebba2e82975e457', 'Operation_08651ed48e6a6a24', 'Operation_a8932121b191ebfc'] RETURN o.__id__ AS operation_id, keys(o) AS operation_keys LIMIT 3"}

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (o:Operation)-[:USES_TOOL]->(t:Tool) WHERE o.__id__ IN ['Operation_27b223bd70a1254f', 'Operation_d726401014da9805', 'Operation_97e08ef99799d485', 'Operation_e901e20c2f6d2018', 'Operation_eb0dfb4600cb30d1', 'Operation_aebba2e82975e457', 'Operation_08651ed48e6a6a24', 'Operation_a8932121b191ebfc'] RETURN o.__id__ AS operation_id, o.Name AS operation_name, o.Type AS operation_type, t.__id__ AS tool_id, t.__hash__ AS tool_hash, t.attributes AS tool_attributes LIMIT 10"}

name: execute_cypher

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (t:Tool) WHERE t.__id__ IN ['Tool_e5e3b0d16ae50481', 'Tool_8b2407c5290f5c1a', 'Tool_356ea62a328897bb', 'Tool_e5ef4e6a78571180', 'Tool_bf75bed34a343cb9'] RETURN t.__id__ AS tool_id, keys(t) AS tool_keys LIMIT 3"}

content: 现在获取所有Tool的详细信息。

function_call.name: execute_cypher
function_call.arguments: {"cypher": "MATCH (t:Tool) WHERE t.__id__ IN ['Tool_e5e3b0d16ae50481', 'Tool_8b2407c5290f5c1a', 'Tool_356ea62a328897bb', 'Tool_e5ef4e6a78571180', 'Tool_bf75bed34a343cb9'] RETURN t.__id__ AS tool_id, t.Name AS tool_name, t.Type AS tool_type, t.SubType AS tool_subtype, t.Diameter AS diameter, t.FluteLen AS flute_len, t.FluteNum AS flute_num, t.Material AS material, t.Number AS tool_number LIMIT 10"}
